item.title: predict employee salaries
item.description: ML-Model-Flask-Deployment This is a demo project to elaborate how Machine Learn Models are deployed on production using Flask API Prerequisites You must have Scikit Learn, Pandas (for Machine Leraning Model) and Flask (for API) installed. Project Structure This project has four major parts : model.py - This contains code fot our Machine Learning model to predict employee salaries absed on trainign data in ‘hiring.csv’ file. app.py - This contains Flask APIs that receives employee details through GUI or API calls, computes the precited value based on our model and returns it.

item.title: IPL First Innings Score Prediction
